description: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a .NET Project management component that enables .NET applications to not only read and manipulate Microsoft Project documents in MPP and XML formats but to also write Microsoft Project documents in MPP or Project XML format - all without using Microsoft Project.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
		TASKS-33291 - Exception raised while loading MSP 2007 (2003) project file saved from MSP 2013
		TASKS-33296 - Cannot read enterprise fileds in MSP 2003 mpp files.
		TASKS-33300 - Calendar data update in 2010 MPP
		TASKS-33303 - FitContent property ignored while rendering tasks to JPEG
		TASKS-33304 - Regression: IsMilestone Flag - Not persisted on save
		TASKS-33305 - Calendar exception week days absent in Aspose xml files while present in MSP xml imported from mpp.
		TASKS-33306 - Extended attribute values present in both extended attributes and outline codes in Aspose xml files, while present in outline codes and absent in extended attributes in MSP xml file
		TASKS-33308 - Cannot read/write Resource.CanLevel flag in 2013, 2010, 2007, 2003 mpp files.
		TASKS-33311 - "Project writing exception" while updating MSP 2007 file and saving back to new MPP

	New Feature
		TASKS-33234 - MS Project 2013 XML format support.
		TASKS-33241 - MS Project 2013 formats support.
summary: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a component to work with Project files
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
